divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were sitting out back watching the stars @ around 11:00(looking East) and we saw this weird light over the mountain range, I grabbed my camera and started to take pictures. Could not figure out what it was, first thinking it was a plane but then realized that couldn't be possible, that I know of. When I first saw the object I was intrigued, wanting to know what it was. as time went on I began feeling anxious and decided to go inside, and go to sleep.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Ridgecrest
There were no other sightings in Ridgecrest on or around September 12th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: one bright light, many smaller lights around it, hovered in and out up and down, almost looked like it was emitting a light from beneath.
